description: The confirm message contains the processing results for the corresponding request.  A request may have its processing reported as: succeeded, partially failed, or failed.

confirmMessageID.description: An identifier for the instance of the confirm message

processID.description: A process identifier if one is available, like a batch ID

processStatus.description: The process results status code for the request

resourceID.description: A resource identifier if one is available

resourceReference.description: An optional additiona reference to the resource

resourceStatus.description: The process results status code for the request
